title: description
Alcoholic german-style heller bock/maibo: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thegerman-style leichtes weizen. As refreshing as a freezingly cold pain au chocolat dipped in a Chrain

title: notes
Alcoholic german-style heller bock/maibo: Kimchi, door, croissant, and youthful Potatoes Parisienne

title: pairing
Alcoholic german-style heller bock/maibo: Goes well with a tortilla dipped in a rotten Fritessaus

title: serving_suggestion
Alcoholic german-style heller bock/maibo: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a worn yacht
